name: courseimport-backend
description: Course Import Node.js with Rest API

scripts.bundle: mkdir deploy && cp -r app server.js package.json package-lock.json courseimport-backend.service .env deploy
scripts.winbundle: md deploy && xcopy app deploy\app /s /h /i /y /e && copy server.js deploy && copy *.json deploy && copy .env deploy

author: cs
